pr_title: [FLINK-15994][Table-planner-blink]Support byte array argument for FROM_BASE64 function

timeline.message: [FLINK-15994][Table-planner-blink]Support byte array arguments for FROM_BASE64 function

timeline.bodyText:
Could you add 2 more tests here?
testSqlApi(
      "FROM_BASE64(x'6147567362473867643239796247513D')",
      "hello world")

testSqlApi(
      "FROM_BASE64(f58)",  ==> add an additional column whose value is "5L2g5aW9".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
      "你好")
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -906,6 +906,10 @@ class ScalarFunctionsTest extends ScalarTypesTestBase {
       "FROM_BASE64('5L2g5aW9')",
       "你好"
     )
+
+    testSqlApi(
+      "FROM_BASE64(CAST(x'6147567362473867643239796247513D' AS VARBINARY))",
+      "hello world")
